biotools.summary: PanDrugs is a method to prioritize anticancer drug treatments according to individual genomic data. PanDrugs current version integrates data from 24 primary sources and supports 56297 drug-target associations obtained from 4804 genes and 9092 unique compounds.

bioschemas.name: PanDrugs
